Data sources, GIS tools and Web-links Data and some Analyses used in this study were produced with the Giovanni online data system, developed and maintained by the NASA GES DISC (Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center).

Monthly accumulated rainfall during the period of 1985-2015. The data were obtained from the Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission (TRMM) with a spatial resolution of 0.25 9 0.25 for (3B43), which can be accessed with the GES DISC Mirador system (http:// mirador.gsfc.nasa.gov). Analyses and visualizations used in this study were produced with the Giovanni online data system, developed and maintained by the NASA GES DISC centre.
